Tails sifted through both sides of herself trying to find an answer. "As far as I can tell I seem to have adopted a few of Tikal's traits. "A demon in otherwords?" Sonic commented... Tails shook her head. "An imp would be a better word. Harmless overall but discomforting. Performing actions such as transformation, short droughts, deception, limited necromancy, etcetra."

Knuckles looked at the card, raising an eyebrow. "I don't get it." he stated, trying to puzzle out just exactly what "A Trade is the body of the issue" could mean.

Showing the card to rouge, he asks "Do you have any idea what that's supposed to mean?" as sonic laughed from the other side of the board.

"Seriously? Confused already Knux? That's a new record." the hedgehog joked.

"Yeah, yeah, laugh it up." Knuckles grumbled, distracted and unintentionally pulling the card back before Rouge could read it.

Quick as a whip the sneak thief snatched it up, but no sooner had her hands touched the cardstock, then there was a 'pop' heard, and her balance felt completely off.

Both she and knuckles let out simultaneous sounds of alarm as they looked down at themselves then each-other. it was an off sight, either of them looking like the body of one stuck to the head and limbs of the other.

While they're staring at each other in shock, one of the others picks up the dice.

info.brief_description: Sonic buys a not-so-ordinary board game and invite his friends over to play.
info.description:
Inspired by A Game of Change except with Sonic chars. Add ons are appreciated.

Sonic feels the urge to buy a weird board game from Merlin's Magic Shop and invites Tails, Amy, Cream, Knuckles and Rouge over to play it. Though they will undoubtedly experience changes along the way since players will transform depending on the spaces or cards drawn.

Here some rules:

1. Anything goes or any body modification/transformation is allowed except for vore (unbirthing is an exception), weight gain, scat and watersports.
2. Sex is allowed, but no gayism/lesbianism.
3. Once an order is established, the players must always continue in that order. However, you can add more players/chars into the mix, but their turn is after the person who last in the established order.
4. If anyone tries to quit, there will be severe consequences.
5. Transformations won't be reversed until the game is finished.
